kw.name: Generate Random String
kw.doc: Generates a string with a desired ``length`` from the given ``chars``.

kw.name: Execute
Run And Return Rc And Output
kw.doc: Runs the given command in the system and returns the RC and output.
kw.msg: ${output} = 2019-08-21 17:40:07 INFO MetricsConfig:118 - Loaded properties from hadoop-metrics2.properties 2019-08-21 17:40:07 INFO MetricsSystemImpl:374 - Scheduled Metric snapshot period at 10 second(s). 2019...

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
kw.msg: 2019-08-21 17:40:07 INFO MetricsConfig:118 - Loaded properties from hadoop-metrics2.properties 2019-08-21 17:40:07 INFO MetricsSystemImpl:374 - Scheduled Metric snapshot period at 10 second(s). 2019-08-21 17:40:07 INFO MetricsSystemImpl:191 - XceiverClientMetrics metrics system started 2019-08-21 17:40:08 INFO GrpcClientProtocolClient:255 - client-D12DCD52DD0D->cc62b3a6-6407-46c2-a1ed-ea0903792266: receive RaftClientReply:client-D12DCD52DD0D->cc62b3a6-6407-46c2-a1ed-ea0903792266@group-74FB94DB9CAC, cid=0, SUCCESS, logIndex=1, commits[cc62b3a6-6407-46c2-a1ed-ea0903792266:c1] 2019-08-21 17:40:08 INFO GrpcClientProtocolClient:255 - client-D12DCD52DD0D->cc62b3a6-6407-46c2-a1ed-ea0903792266: receive RaftClientReply:client-D12DCD52DD0D->cc62b3a6-6407-46c2-a1ed-ea0903792266@group-74FB94DB9CAC, cid=1, SUCCESS, logIndex=3, commits[cc62b3a6-6407-46c2-a1ed-ea0903792266:c4]

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Integers
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to integers.

Run And Return Rc And Output

kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to integers.

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.
